name: Mamie Dress No.1 Chocolate Brown
description: The 'Mamie Dress No.1' is an easy to wear, must have faux wrap dress that can take you from day to night accessorized accordingly. Particular attention has been given to the expert couture like cut of the Mamie dress and the result is a curvaceous, flattering feminine piece that is an essential item to any plus size women's capsule wardrobe. The high quality crepe jersey has been cut especially to sit perfectly on the bust (no need for a camisole underneath) and the engineering of the cut combined with nine percent lycra means it truly flatters your figure in the right places. It comes in three sizes - 18, 20, 22 and is available in charcoal black and chocolate brown. Fitting The dress flares slightly on from the waist to give movement to the fabric and the sleeves flare slightly at the end. The sash skims over the waist adding illusion away from the stomach area. It is 90cm from centre back to hem meaning its sits just below the knee. Fabric composition Crepe Viscose Jersey with 9% lycra Wash & care Easy wash, 30 degrees. Cool iron (rarely needs ironing) Do not tumble dry. Lovingly Designed and Made in the UK
